TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChaosExperimentResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a ChaosExperiment along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetChaosExperimentResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetChaosExperiment method.
